title: New: Carnivals – Departners
content:
Sheffield’s Carnivals could hardly sound less British, with their pronounced beats and tropical samples on new track Departners.

Four minutes of production bliss, it’s a musical journey that will guide you far from these sultry shores and leaves you wondering how something this good could come from such a seemingly contrasting area of the world. Check out Departners below and grab a free download if you’re diggin’.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
